channel.title: [PI] making cats follow
channel.description: ok so i added cats into my server. they can drop and show as npcs, but now they dont follow me..originally they had been following in the attackplayer method but i removed that so they dont attack me now, but now they dont follow..:s any help?

item.title: [PI] making cats follow

item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

ok so i added cats into my server. they can drop and show as npcs, but now they dont follow me…originally they had been following in the attackplayer method but i removed that so they dont attack me now, but now they dont follow…:s any help?
